languages.text: "Философский вопрос! Полагаю, дело в сложном сплаве опыта, удачи и в большей степени — благоволения Императора".
"A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
languages.original_text: "Философский вопрос! Полагаю, дело в сложном сплаве опыта, удачи и в большей степени — благоволения Императора".

traits.locale_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it's due to a complicated blend of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
"A philosophical question! I imagine it's due to a complicated blend of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
"A philosophical question! I imagine it's due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
"A philosophical question! I imagine it's due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
"A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
"A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."

languages.text: « Une question pour le moins philosophique ! J'imagine que c'est un savant mélange d'expérience, de chance et surtout, de la faveur de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."

traits.locale_text: « Une question pour le moins philosophique ! J'imagine que c'est un savant mélange d'expérience, de chance et surtout, de la faveur de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «¡Una cuestión filosófica! Me imagino que se debe a una combinación compleja de experiencia, suerte y, por encima de todo, el favor del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."

traits.locale_text: «¡Una cuestión filosófica! Me imagino que se debe a una combinación compleja de experiencia, suerte y, por encima de todo, el favor del Emperador».

languages.text: “真是个充满哲学意义的问题！我想，这可能是一系列复杂因素共同作用的结果，包括经验、运气，而最重要的，是帝皇的保佑。”
languages.original_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."

traits.locale_text: “真是个充满哲学意义的问题！我想，这可能是一系列复杂因素共同作用的结果，包括经验、运气，而最重要的，是帝皇的保佑。”

languages.text: 「何とも哲学的な質問ですな！ 経験、運、そして何よりも皇帝の寵愛が複雑に絡み合ってのことでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."

traits.locale_text: 「哲学的な質問！ 経験、運、そして何よりも皇帝の寵愛が複雑に絡み合ってのことでしょうね」

languages.text: "Eine philosophische Frage! Vermutlich ist es eine komplizierte Mischung aus Erfahrung, Glück und vor allem der Gunst des Imperators."
languages.original_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."

traits.locale_text: "Eine philosophische Frage! Vermutlich ist es eine komplizierte Mischung aus Erfahrung, Glück und vor allem der Gunst des Imperators."

languages.text: "Felsefi bir soru! Tahminimce biraz deneyim, biraz şans ve hepsinden önemlisi İmparator'un lütfuna sahip olmakla alakalı olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: "A philosophical question! I imagine it is due to a complicated mix of experience, luck, and most of all, the Emperor's favour."
